problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, chord AC = N_0, chord AE is perpendicular to the radius OB, AE = N_1, and ∠CAO = ∠BOA, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
raw_answer: 解:延长AO交⊙O于M．连接CM,设OB交AE于K．∵OB⊥AE,∴∠AKO=90°,AK=EK=12,∵AM是直径,∴∠ACM=90°,∵∠CAM=∠AOK,∴△AKO∽△MCA,∴\frac{OA}{AM}=\frac{AK}{MC}=2,∴MC=24,在Rt△ACM中,AM=√{AC²+CM²}=25,∴OA=\frac{1}{2}AM=12.5,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查垂径定理,勾股定理,相似三角形的判定和性质等知识,解题的关键是学会添加常用辅助线,构造相似三角形解决问题,属于中考常考题型．
